Sentencas: This paper conducts a multiscale parameter study of temperature and composition effects on the transport phenomenon of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Multiscale parametric studies on the transport phenomenon of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The molecular dynamics technique was employed to study the transport phenomenon of the solid electrolyte, which is made of yttria-stabilized zirconia.
Titulo: Multiscale parametric studies on the transport phenomenon of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The influences of Y2O3 concentration and various operation temperatures on the SOFC were studied.
Titulo: Multiscale parametric studies on the transport phenomenon of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Simulation results show that there exists an optimal concentration Of 8 mol % Of Y2O3 in the composition for oxygen transport.
Titulo: Multiscale parametric studies on the transport phenomenon of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Also higher operation temperature promotes the oxygen ion-hopping process that increases the ionic conductivity A macroscale parametric study was also conducted in this paper to validate the influence of the temperature uniformity in the solid electrolyte by employing the computational fluid dynamics technique.
Titulo: Multiscale parametric studies on the transport phenomenon of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The temperature distribution maps of a single-cell planar SOFC with coflow, counterflow and cross-flow channel designs are presented.
Titulo: Multiscale parametric studies on the transport phenomenon of a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results conclude that the coflow configuration is the best design of the three.
Titulo: Multiscale parametric studies on the transport phenomenon of a solid oxide fuel cell
